thread.title: Walmart Has a 'Soft' and 'Lightweight' 2-Piece French Terry Jogger Set for as Low as $14 - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Walmart Has a 'Soft' and 'Lightweight' 2-Piece French Terry Jogger Set for as Low as $14 - NewsBreak

author: Jewel Elizabeth
title: Walmart Has a 'Soft' and 'Lightweight' 2-Piece French Terry Jogger Set for as Low as $14 - NewsBreak
text:
By Jewel Elizabeth ,
7 hours ago
Parade aims to feature only the best products and services. If you buy something via one of our links, we may earn a commission.
If you're on the hunt for the ultimate blend of comfort and style , look no further than Walmart ’s delightful Time and Tru French Terry Jogger Set . It comes with a versatile sweatshirt and a pair of matching joggers, and it’s now offered at an unbeatable price of just $14.
Originally priced at $28, this two-piece ensemble is making waves not only for its affordability, but also for the cozy vibes it brings. While some color options remain at full price, several varieties are currently on sale for between $14 and $20 depending on the hue and size.
Time and Tru French Terry Two-Piece Jogger Set, From $14 (was $28) at Walmart Crafted from a super-soft blend of 52% cotton and 48% polyester, this set is designed for lounging in style. The fabric is lightweight, making it perfect for those lazy weekend afternoons or a casual outing with friends. The long-sleeve sweatshirt features a trendy V-neck design at the front, adding a touch of flair to your cozy attire. With dropped shoulders and ribbed cuffs, it seamlessly combines comfort and chicness.
Related: Walmart Has a 'Powerful' and 'Compact' Milwaukee Combo Tool Kit on Sale for Just $175
What’s more, the accompanying jogger pants come with a pull-on style and a ribbed elastic waist for that perfect fit. The two front pockets are an added bonus, allowing you to stash your essentials while staying fashionable. Whether you're enjoying a movie night in or running errands around town, shoppers love how this jogger set is versatile enough to suit any fashion need.
"So soft and comfy," one shopper wrote. "This is a nice, soft, lightweight, French terry cloth fabric jogger and top set [that ’s] a good value for the price. It fits very well. Another plus is that this jogger set has pockets!"
Time and Tru French Terry Two-Piece Jogger Set, From $14 (was $28) at Walmart Available in an array of eight stylish colors, including classic black, light blue, and bold burgundy wine, this jogger set caters to all tastes. With sizes ranging from extra small to 4X, everyone can find their perfect fit and feel fabulous.
Best of all, caring for this stylish set is a breeze — simply toss it in the washing machine for quick, easy cleaning.
Shop More Deals Treat yourself to this adorable $14 jogger set that offers an unbeatable combination of style, comfort, and practicality. Snag yours at Walmart before it’s gone!
